params.coinId: The team to support (0 = Bitcoin, 1 = Ethereum)

joinRace(uint8).notice: Join the race by supporting a specific crypto team

resetGame().notice: Reset the game to lobby state (only organizer)

startGame().notice: Start the game (only organizer) Requires at least one player supporting each coin

tap().notice: Tap to advance the supported coin Pure speed contest - tap as fast as you can!

userdoc.notice: Tapnad - Bitcoin vs Ethereum Racing Game dApp Players tap to advance their chosen crypto around a circular track Team Bitcoin (₿) vs Team Ethereum (Ξ)
